11.content: How will she become pregnant?
11.title: Hermione

choices: Accidentally switches with a witch trying to conceive
112.title: Potion

1121.content:
Harry, Ron, and Hermione were walking sitting in The Leaky Cauldron. They were about to enter their sixth year at Hogwarts, and were waiting for the Hogwarts Express to pick them up. Meanwhile, in Knockturn Alley, a middle-aged witch was desperately trying to conceive. She walked into a potion shop, in hopes of finding a solution. As she walked in, she was greeted by an old, balding wizard, who owned the shop. "What do you want?'' he said angrily. The witch glanced around nervously. "Uh... well, my husband and I are trying to have a baby, and I was wondering if you had anything to fix our problem?" The wizard answered almost immediately. "I have just the thing!" He returned with a bottle of soda pop. "Is that the potion?"she asked. "Yes, just wanted to conceal its identity-be warned, only drink a fifth of the bottle, I overfilled it accidentally." The witch understood. She exited the shop and quickly made her way to The Leaky Cauldron. Inside, she took a seat next to Harry, Hermione, and Ron. "Well, it's almost time to go to King's Cross,"Harry said. Hermione returned to their table with a soda bottle in her hand. The witch got up, unaware of Hermione standing there. Hermione and the witch both dropped their bottles. In a mad dash, Hermione grabbed the wrong bottle, and left with the two boys. "I'm so sorry," Hermione said as she left the pub.

Hermoine realized how thirsty she was, and began to chug the bottle. "Blimey!" Ron said, "Are you thirsty?" Hermione gave no answer, and gave a glaring look at Ron. Ron understood this, and became silent. Hermione finished the bottle just as the Hogwarts Express arrived at Platform 9 & 3/4. The three loaded up their luggage and found a seat. Not far into their journey, a woman driving a trolley filled with candy stopped by their door. "Anything off the trolley, dears?"
1121.title: Accidentally switches with a witch trying to co...

11211.content:
Hermione's belly rumbled with hunger. "I guess I am hungry," she said, "I'll take one of everything" Ron looked at her bewildered. "I'll have a Chocolate Frog and Every Flavor Beans," he said. Harry bought one Cauldron Cake, and the woman left them to eat.

Later, when Hermione finished her binge, she let out a big moan. "Ugh, that was a lot of food," she said tiredly. She decided to take a nap before the Express arrived at Hogwarts, which would be a few hours. She laid back and entered a deep sleep. When Hermione woke up, it was time to put on her school robes on, so she grabbed the clothes and went to the restroom. When she got in the restroom, a wave of nausea went threw her, and she threw up in the toilet. "I must have ate too much." She began to strip down to her bra and panties, and noticed that her bra was tighter, "Must have accidentally put on one that was too small.." She looked at her reflection in the mirror, and noticed that her belly was slightly puffy. "Well, that's what you get for eating too much..." She poked her belly, and noticed that it had little give. She gave it a small rub, which felt oddly good. Hermione put on her uniform, and noticed that it completely hid the mysterious bulge. She thought no more of it and returned to her compartment.

Minutes later, Hogwarts became in sight, and took the attention of all on the train. They soon arrived at the castle, made their way to the Great Hall, heard Dumbledore's annual speech, and saw food magically appear on their plates. Hermione's belly rumbled ominously.
11211.title: Hermione was oddly very hungry

112111.content:
Hermione's belly rumbled again, and she began to pig out. She ate steak, potatoes, and much more. Half an hour later, she had finished, and was very stuffed and tired. She could tell that her belly had grown a bit more, and could make it out through her shirt. Hermione gave a big yawn and said,"Well, I'm tired, I will see you all in the morning." And with that, she slowly walked out of the Great Hall. As she was walking up the stairs, she noticed that it was harder to go up the stairs than usual. She made her way to the Gryffindor common room, and walked into her dorm. She began to undress in order to put her pajamas on, and noticed that her breasts and belly were both larger. If anyone had seen her belly, they would have thought that she had a large meal, which she did. Hermione put on her pajamas on, and could easily see her belly from the t-shirt. She climbed into bed and quickly went to sleep.

It was morning, by the time Hermione woke up, and she felt very hungry. She sat up and began to get dressed. Her belly had grown a minuscule amount since last night. Hermione went to the Great Hall to eat breakfast. She had a large meal, which made her belly puff out more. After breakfast, she had to go to their first class, which was....

A. Potions

B. Defense Against the Dark Arts
112111.title: Hermione stuffs herself silly

choices: Draco gives her pregnancy potion to humiliate her
1123.title: Other

11232.content:
Bellatrix gives her a potion, just before escaping from Malfoy's Manor, causing that every time she feels strong emotions for at least a second, 9-month-old baby will appear in her womb. The longer and the stronger the emotions, the more and faster babies appear.

Does something like that will be ok?
11232.title: Something else

13.content: How does she become pregnant?
13.title: Luna

choices: Accidentally switches with a witch trying to conceive
132.title: Potion

1322.content:
Luna, had always been a bit loony but ever since the battle minstery last year she had babies on the mind. In truth a near miss with a confundus jinx had caused this but Luna nor anyone else was aware of this, all Luna knew was that she desperatly wanted to have a baby.

When she start her 5th year she spent her free time of the first few days in the library trying to find a magic solution to her desire. After about a week and a bit she what she was looking for, a potion which would make the drinker become pregnant without having to have sex. This was perfect for Luna because even with the popularity she had gained from the fight with the death eaters she still had not seemed to attracted the desires of anyone.

She started brewing the potion in the 'out of order' girl's bathroom with Moaning Myrtle in it, in fact the only other person who ever seem to come in was Draco Malfoy who seemed to be too preoccuppied to check all the cubicles.

After another few weeks the potion was nearly done all she needed was a hair from a 'father', in fact the book didn't mention that the hair had to be from a male.

Who will the hair be from?
1322.title: Wants to be a mom

13222221.content:
Not wanting to wait any longer then she already had, Luna plucked one of the hairs off her own head and placed it in the potion, it fizzed for a moment then settled back down to simmering. She took a cup of it and drunk it. She nearly coughed it back up, it tastes range from the smell of shampoo and soap to vomit and several different things in between. When she had finished she didn't fill any different, evedently nothing would happen for a while but there was no added feeling of being full of life.

she looked down at the couldren the was still quite a bit there, she decided to...
13222221.title: One of her own hairs

1322222121.content:
With a feeling of dread slipping over her, what was she thinking, she wasn't able to have baby at her age. Panicing she tipped the contents cauldren into the toliet and flushed it. She grabbed the book the recipe was from and feverously started searching through the pages to find an antidote. After several minutes of reading she slammed it shut and rushed out of the bathroom nearly hitting Malfoy on her way out but was already half way down the corridor before he got his bearing to insult her. She didn't stop until she got to the library, where she started looking for a book that could undo the potion she had just drunk.

Not long into this she felt....
1322222121.title: Flush it down the toilet.

13222221211.content:
A wave of fatigue hit Luna, she had been not getting much sleep lately, what with brewing the potion and all, she could fix in the morning, it was a weekend after all. There was no major rush, muggles could get rid pregnancy within the first few weeks so wizards should have a better solution, it did have a vague feeling of kill, but it life would be filled with more trouble and trial, at this age. The potion might of not even worked, she didn't feel any difference when she first took it, maybe she made it wrong admitterly it might of had other side effects but they would of been apperent by now.
The only difference she had felt apart from the dread was this tiredness, maybe thats what the potion did was clear her head of this baby nonsense and made her drowsy. She could find out in the morning.
When Luna got back to her dormitary she changed into her pyjamas and went to sleep.

When she woke up she felt...
13222221211.title: Tired

132222212112.content:
When Luna woke up she felt incredibly nauseous, she flopped out of bed and crawled over to the toliet attached to the domitry and emptied the contents of her stomach, 'well' she thought to herself 'even if the potion had worked her body had rejected it'.
The problem was that there was no sex ed class, whilst the basics of where babies came from and how they got there was known, Luna did care of magical creatures after all, some details such as morning sickness in this case was completely unknown to an only child like Luna who had lost her mother before she explained a few more the details.

So it was Luna after only half heartedly searched for an antidote, which she didn't find, that she came to the conclusion that the potion must of been made wrong and the vomiting and nauseous that she experienced was the side effect.

It wasn't until ______ later was she proved wrong.
132222212112.title: Sick

1322222121121.content:
Four weeks later, after throwing up again Luna had thought about going to the hospital wing to see if it could be stopped. As she strained up how ever she had caught sight of herself in the mirror, for the side her belly did look rather bloated.
It was true that she had been eatting alot more recently, she assumed her hunger was caused by the fact she coudn't anything down for long. But looking at herself in the mirror she could really see a difference in her. Her breast and backside also seemed bigger, it could of been normal at her age, but her belly seemed much bigger though. It is true that her pants and skirt were more slightly harder to do up these days but she figured that was just ordinary bloating, which is why she hadn't got any larger clothing.
But at the moment whilst still small her belly was straining the buttons on her shirt.

Feeling fearful she made her way to the library and started searching for books on pregnancy, it took her a while, the books she originally found were mostly about magical effects on pregnancy or what goes wrong if you took certain types of potion when pregnant, the pictures were not pretty, she wonder why she even wanted to have a baby in the first place.
She found a book in the muggle studies section as a selection of example texts, which discribed the symptoms of pregnancy and horror started to fill her as she found out about morning sickness and other symptoms which she had been feeling over the last few weeks. She looked down at her bulging belly, 'but why was she this big?' according to this book she shouldn't look like this for another eight weeks and the other book didn't mention anything about accelirated time, just the lack of sex.

She was suddenly hit by another wave of tiredness she decide she needed to sort this out but now she need sleep other wise she would make another hasty and unwise decision. She hired the book out from the library and like a month before went to the dormitry changed into her pyjamas, (the nightie was large enough to cover the bulge) and went to sleep.

When she woke up in the morning she was determined to sort out this mess but as soon as she got up she felt...
1322222121121.title: 4 weeks

choices: Much bigger, in case didn't find a way to 'fix' herself anytime soon.
13222221211211.content:
The overwhelming sensation of hunger overcame Luna and after getting dressed making sure to wear a robe so that no one could see her bloated stomach, she made her way down to the great hall.
When she got there it wasn't long before she started gorging herself on the food there; bacon, eggs, toast, cereal anything that was close infront of her at the time, quite often making dreadful combinations such as ketchup on oatmeal, she was so busy in the act of eat not to mind nor notice the couple of muffled pings from underneath her robe. Finally though another wave of nausea hit her and she bolt up to the out of order girls bath room, where she vomit yet again after a few minutes of this she got up. Her robe flopped open and Luna saw that two buttons had popped off her shirt, supprisingly it was the middle ones. She turned to face herself in the mirror and saw her belly bulging out of her shirt, it didn't seem to much bigger then yesterday, just enought to pop the buttons.

She obviously was having the baby she 'wanted' and she obviously needed some new clothes. But how much bigger?
13222221211211.title: Hungry

132222212112111.content:
She decide to get for her current size, no point wasting money on clothes that will be to big on her and which she never may use. Luckly for her the first Hogsmede was coming up, she would visit the clothes shop there. In the days til then she tried to find a way to end it, she couldn't find any magical way and all muggle ways required a doctor.

The day of the Hogsmede visit came, she put on her rapidly shrinking clothes, pulled on her robe and made her way to the village with the rest of the students. She got to the shop and spent several minutes looking through the clothes before slipping into one of the changing rooms. It was magically, on the outside it looked no bigger then an ordinary change room but on the inside it was a rather spacious room with several wall sized mirrors. Some how there made her feel rather self concious especially when she let her robe fall open, her belly had noticably grown in the last few days causing another couple of her shirt buttons of her shirt to pop off.
She got changed trying not to look at herself in the mirror until she was fully dress, The new clothes didn't hide her bugle but at least they could do up and didn't strain which would of emphised the size. The pants however were to tight, whilst she could do them up they were stretch of her noticably larger rear.

Get got change back into her current clothes pull the robe on, switch the pants for a larger sized and went to pay for them.

She couldn't afford to by new clothes every few weeks, she need to find a way to reverse the potion, she should hopefully find one any day now.
132222212112111.title: To fit her now

1322222121121111.content:
The weeks went by and Luna could not find any evidence of a process to reverse the potion, and all the time she grew. One month later she was looking down at her belly, how come she was this bigger already, according to the book she should barely be showing now but she had the dimensions of someone who was for months along. Her new shirt was straining to cover her belly, whilst she could no longer properly do up her pants, her robe could barely concel the bump anymore and she was only going to get bigger. She didn't have long to consider this however as her regular morning urge to eat overwhelmed her, it had stedily became more insitent over the weeks whilst the morning sickness had tailed away.

She went down to the great hall and gorged herself in a familiar way to both herself and her fellow student, many of which thought by the way she was eating and vomit must of developed so sort of eating disorder. After about half an hour she was hit with a wave of nausea and left for the out of order bathroom yet again.

When she had finished vomiting she heard someone it was...
1322222121121111.title: 1 month later

13222221211211111.content:
"YOOOoouuu," someone screeched, Luna was so shock she fell on onto the cubicle door. Moaning Myrtle's head and shoulders float out of the floor in front of her. "It was YOU!" she said.
"I s-sorry if I vomited on yo..."
"It's not THAT, when you live in a toliet there are worse things people can do to you then vomit on you." "It was you though who poured a pregnancy potion down the toliet a couple of months ago I know it was you as you are swollen with you CRIME," she jabbing an ethereal finger at Luna's bulging stomach.
"How do you know it was pregnancy potion?"
Myrtle rose up infront of her and around her, Luna pressed her up against the cubicle door to avoid myrtle's spectral belly, she looked full term, and unlike Luna Myrtle had not invested in some larger clothes, her 4th year uniform from 50 years ago was not up to the task of covering her body, her sweater vest was bunched up between her swollen breasts as it obviously had no chance of covering even part of her belly, her shirt (or what could be seen of it) was unbuttoned, whilst on her lower half the skirt was under belly at the front and so culd be seen but at the back is was having trouble covering an expaned rear.
"B-but ghosts can't get pregnant."
"OH we CAN'T," said she and flew her belly into Luna.
After the inital cold sensation Luna opened her eyes and saw several unborn ghostly babies infront of her. Panicin her questing hand found the door latch and she open the cubicle and stumbled out of the bathroom, Myrtle ungainly flew out of the cubicle and shouted after her, "YOU CAN'T RUN AWAY FROM OR YOUR CHILDREN."

Luna kept running.

She decided to ....
13222221211211111.title: Moaning Myrtle

Make the girls from Harry Potter pregnant.

Rules:

Entries cannot be short.

Try to have good grammar.

Have Fun!
